languages.text: {n}Вы легко выбиваете клинок из руки Маражая — на мгновение вам кажется, что он специально ослабил хватку. Однако следующий ваш удар он явно не ожидал. Клинок с хрустом входит под челюсть ксеноса, пробивая горло и ломая позвонки. Последний изумленный, неверящий взгляд — и Маражай Эзирраеш замертво падает на пол.{/n}

{n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы легко выбиваете клинок из руки Маражая — на мгновение вам кажется, что он специально ослабил хватку. Однако следующий ваш удар он явно не ожидал. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你轻而易举地从玛拉斋手中夺下了刀。有那么一瞬间，你认为他应该是故意松开了手。然而，他肯定没有预料到你接下来的一击。随着一声脆响，你将刀刃刺入了他的下巴，刺穿了他的喉咙，粉碎了他的脊椎。在他生命的最后一刻，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什对你露出了震惊不已、难以置信的眼神……随后倒在地上，断气了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你轻而易举地从玛拉斋手中夺下了刀。有那么一瞬间，你认为他应该是故意松开了手。然而，他肯定没有预料到你接下来的一击。随着一声脆响，你将刀刃刺入了他的下巴，刺穿了他的喉咙，粉碎了他的脊椎。在他生命的最后一刻，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什对你露出了震惊不已、难以置信的眼神……随后倒在地上，断气了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの手からヒョイッと刃を引き抜いた…一瞬、わざと持つ手を緩めていたのかと思ったほどだ。しかし、確実に彼は次の攻撃を予想していなかった。バリバリと音を立てて、顎の下に刃を入れて喉を突き刺し、脊椎をメチャクチャにする。最後にもう一度驚いて信じられない表情をした後...マラズハイ・アエジレシュは床に倒れて命を落とした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの手からヒョイッと刃を引き抜いた…一瞬、わざと持つ手を緩めていたのかと思ったほどだ。しかし、確実に彼は次の攻撃を予想していなかった。バリバリと音を立てて、顎の下に刃を入れて喉を突き刺し、脊椎をメチャクチャにする。最後にもう一度驚いて信じられない表情をした後...マラズハイ・アエジレシュは床に倒れて命を落とした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arrebatas el puñal a Marazhai con facilidad; durante un segundo tienes la impresión de que ha aflojado deliberadamente la mano. Pero lo que sin duda no esperaba es tu siguiente movimiento: hundes el puñal bajo su mandíbula con un crujido, atravesándole la garganta y partiéndole varias vértebras. Una última mirada de asombro e incredulidad... y Marazhai Aezyrraesh se desploma sin vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arrebatas el puñal a Marazhai con facilidad; durante un segundo tienes la impresión de que ha aflojado deliberadamente la mano. Pero lo que sin duda no esperaba es tu siguiente movimiento: hundes el puñal bajo su mandíbula con un crujido, atravesándole la garganta y partiéndole varias vértebras. Una última mirada de asombro e incredulidad... y Marazhai Aezyrraesh se desploma sin vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous emparez de l'arme de Marazhai avec une aisance déconcertante, à tel point que vous en venez à vous demander s'il ne l'a pas lâchée délibérément. Pour autant, il n'avait manifestement pas anticipé le coup qui s'ensuit. Vous plongez la lame sous sa mâchoire dans un craquement sinistre, transperçant sa gorge et brisant ses vertèbres. Sur un dernier regard de stupéfaction et d'incrédulité, Marazhai Aezyrraesh tombe raide mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous emparez de l'arme de Marazhai avec une aisance déconcertante, à tel point que vous en venez à vous demander s'il ne l'a pas lâchée délibérément. Pour autant, il n'avait manifestement pas anticipé le coup qui s'ensuit. Vous plongez la lame sous sa mâchoire dans un craquement sinistre, transperçant sa gorge et brisant ses vertèbres. Sur un dernier regard de stupéfaction et d'incrédulité, Marazhai Aezyrraesh tombe raide mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Spielend leicht nimmst du Marazhai die Klinge aus der Hand – dir kommt kurz der Gedanke, dass er seinen Griff absichtlich gelockert hat. Ganz sicher hat er allerdings nicht mit deinem nächsten Schlag gerechnet – mit einem knirschenden Geräusch stößt du die Klinge von unten durch seinen Kiefer, wodurch du seine Kehle durchbohrst und seine Halswirbelsäule zertrümmerst. Ein letzter erstaunter, ungläubiger Blick ... und Marazhai Aezyrraesh fällt tot zu Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

Ein letzter erstaunter, ungläubiger Blick ... und Marazhai Aezyrraesh fällt tot zu Boden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bıçağı Marazhai'ın elinden kolaylıkla çekiyorsun. Bir anlığına kasıtlı olarak elini gevşettiğini düşünüyorsun. Ancak bir sonraki darbeni öngöremediği aşikâr. Bir çatırtı eşliğinde bıçağı çenesinin altından saplıyor ve boğazını delip omurgasını parçalıyorsun. Afallamış, inkâr dolu son bir bakış ve... Marazhai Aezyrraesh'ın ölü bedeni yerde yatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pluck the blade from Marazhai's hand with ease — for a moment, you think he deliberately loosened his grip. But he certainly did not anticipate your next strike — with a crunch, you drive the blade under his jaw, piercing his throat and shattering his vertebrae. One last astonished, disbelieving look... and Marazhai Aezyrraesh falls dead to the floor.{/n}

Bir çatırtı eşliğinde bıçağı çenesinin altından saplayarak boğazını delip omurgasını parçalıyorsun. Afallamış, inkâr dolu son bir bakış ve... Marazhai Aezyrraesh'ın ölü bedeni yerde yatıyor.{/n}
